nodes.text: Slashtown was a prisoner colony on Despayre that accommodated criminal convicts sentenced to transportation to the prison planet. It was located in Grid 4354, Sector 547 of Quadrant 3 of the planet.

Both Celot Ratua Dil and Sergeant Nova Stihl came from Slashtown before transferring to the Death Star via their own respective means. Other notable criminal personalities resident at the colony included Balahteez, Brun and Monn.
